name: Userstyles v2011-2016
description: Revive Userstyles.org in its 2011-2016 version. Sometime need Hard Refresh / F5 to work. Best experience at full screen. If you create/edit style, shrink the windows input.

user.name: Zigaudrey
user.about: A person who creates CSS style because there are things I don't agree.

additional_info:
The sheet was created weeks ago until I found site inconsistency, thinking it was an upgrade. When you go to Site Styles, it changes to Android look than Classic look. This cause the style being unpublished.
If you accidentally go to Site Styles, go to HomePage and refresh by clicking on the URL bar and Enter or F5 for Hard Refresh.
You can get the Category page to its Classic look but it is difficult to do (I get one time but doesn't know how that happened).

The sheet is published as an archive but if you want to use it, follow instructions.

Well, too bad, I wanted to do a Userstyles-ception joke. This took three day to do it.
